skillTree.localised_description: To fire the forges and bring true craft and artifice back into the world.
A true Lord knows the Underway, his Dwarfhold and how to fight under the ground better than anyone.

effects.description:
Leadership: +6 when fighting against Skaven
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +6 during subterranean siege battles
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +6 during subterranean intercept battles
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This stubborn Dwarf refuses to yield or tire, and ensures his followers are of the same ilk.
This Lord belts out orders and can be heard even across a battlefield smothered in the grim noise of war.
The endless courage of the Warrior God, directed to bolster this Dawiâ€™s own reserves.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The weight of every single insult, grievance, umbrage and ill-feeling, channelled into a single, crushing swing of the axe.
It's a crazy piece of acrobatics, for sure, but it might just work; if it does, Ungrim's opponent has no chance.
"Come back here, you cowardly piece of green filth and take what's coming to you!"

effects.description: Weapon strength: +8% when fighting against Greenskins

skillTree.localised_description: "I thought I killed you already! Back for some more? Take that!"

effects.description: Weapon strength: +8% when fighting against Vampire Counts

skillTree.localised_description: "I'm not afraid of you - my beloved Ancestors are older and wiser than your dark, uncaring deities!"

effects.description: Weapon strength: +8% when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs and Norsca

skillTree.localised_description: Those who take up the mantle of Slayer are steeled for the fight and enjoy Valaya's blessings and protection.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +15% for Ungrim and Slayer units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +30% for Slayer units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Having taken the Slayer Oath, Ungrim will stop at nothing to meet his death in battle.
The King of Slayers is an awe inspiring sight to every Dwarf but especially those that have taken the Slayer Oath.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Slayer units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Slayers are constantly looking for the most glorious death in battle against the largest creatures, including dragons.

effects.description:
Bonus vs Large: +10 for Slayer Units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Daemon Slayers seek out the most horrifying foes, those in servitude to the Ruinous Powers.

effects.description: Melee attack: +15 when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Norsca and Daemons

skillTree.localised_description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
Dwarfs are resolute - once they commit to charging the foe, they put all their strength behind that initial blow.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
All Dwarfs despise the Greenskins, for the urki and grobi are the prime agents in the Times of Woe.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +7% when fighting against Greenskins
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins

skillTree.localised_description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
Dwarfs are not fast, yet they will soldier on, always moving despite any hazards encountered.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: A Lord and his az are never separated, for it is as much part of him as his beard.

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
This Dwarf spent time in the pits, gaining a Miner's intuition of the dangers and prey to be found in the dark.

skillTree.localised_description: "All Dwarfs to me! We have grudges to settle - Grimnir demands it!"
Countless conflicts and a keen sense of awareness have made this Lord difficult to entrap.

skillTree.localised_description: A wise Lord will gather Engineers to his service, ensuring the Dwarfs maintain their technological edge.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any large attacker.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

factionEffects.localised_description: There are few kinds of monsters walking the world that Ungrim Ironfist has not slain in battle. Ungrim deals death - carving a path of red ruin before him while singing songs of old in a booming voice.

effects.description:

	(all armies)

items.colour_text: This majestic, horned helmet has been worn by every Slayer King since the time of King Baragor.
